name: enfLookup
description: A Command Line Tool to perform Electrical Network Frequency analysis
author: Chris Hodges <chris@openenf.io> (https://openenf.io)

scripts.test: dotnet build ../cs/ENFLookupServer --configuration Release -o test/serverExecutable/macos --no-incremental --runtime osx-x64 --self-contained && dotnet build ../cs/ENFLookupServer --configuration Release -o test/serverExecutable/linux --no-incremental --runtime linux-x64 --self-contained && dotnet build ../cs/ENFLookupServer --configuration Release -o test/serverExecutable/windows --no-incremental --runtime win-x64 --self-contained && node --experimental-wasm-eh node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --forceExit --testPathIgnorePatterns "long.test.ts"
